meta.title: Buffalo Cauliflower Wings
meta.description: This recipe is great for parties!

steps.caption: grease the pan!
steps.instructions: Line a sheet pan with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray.

steps.caption: make a batter
steps.instructions: Mix 1/2 cup flour and 1/2 cup milk in a large bowl, and stir until smooth.

steps.caption: add seasoning
steps.instructions: Add 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon ground pepper to the batter, and mix thoroughly.

steps.caption: cut cauliflower
steps.instructions: Using a paring knife, cut a medium head of cauliflower into nugget-sized pieces. It is easiest to start by removing the central stem, then gradually cutting the pieces smaller and smaller.

steps.caption: batter the cauliflower
steps.instructions: Place the cauliflower pieces in the batter, and stir until evenly coated.

steps.caption: spread the cauliflower
steps.instructions: Pour the cauliflower onto the prepared baking sheet, and spread evenly.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Bake in a 425 degree oven for 8 minutes. Continue to the next step to make sauce for the cauliflower.

steps.caption: melt butter
steps.instructions: In a small glass bowl or measuring cup, melt 2 tablespoons of butter.

steps.caption: make the sauce
steps.instructions: Add 2/3 cup hot sauce and 1/3 cup barbecue sauce to the melted butter, and stir until smooth.

steps.caption: wait
steps.instructions: Wait for the cauliflower to finish baking.

steps.caption: melt butter
steps.instructions: After the first 8 minutes has passed, use a spatula or fork to flip the cauliflower pieces over.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Put the cauliflower back in the oven and bake for another 8 minutes.

steps.caption: add the sauce
steps.instructions: Pour about half the sauce over the cauliflower, and toss with a spatula to coat.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Put back in the oven for another 10 minutes.

steps.caption: add more sauce
steps.instructions: After 10 minutes have passed, add the rest of the sauce and toss again to coat.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Put back in the oven for another 10 minutes.

steps.caption: flip the cauliflower
steps.instructions: After 10 minutes have passed, flip the cauliflower with a spatula.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Put back in the oven for another 5 minutes.

steps.caption: serve
steps.instructions: Allow the cauliflower to cool for a few minutes, then serve (traditionally with blue cheese dressing or another creamy dressing).
